short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Bentley Wallpaper turn new tab to custom HD Bentley background. Bentley wallpaper theme for cars fans.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Extension Features:

1. Every new tab displays a shuffled Bentley wallpaper.
2. Customize your Bentley background randomly or select favorites in the wallpaper panel.
3. Integrated Google search bar.
4. Direct links to email and social media platforms.
5. Automatically displays the current date and time.
6. New Note feature to jot down tasks.
7. Quick links to frequently visited websites.
8. Convenient access to bookmarks.
9. Add shortcuts to websites for fast navigation.
10. Instant access to Google applications.
11. Explore more themes with ease.
12. Share content directly to social media.
13. Download wallpapers quickly.
14. One-click access to games.
15. Activate seasonal animations like snow, rain, falling leaves, or fireworks on your Bentley tab.
